subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With goals from Derek Stepan, Brad Richards and Chris Kreider, the Rangers’ victory means the testy first-round series will return to Madison Square Garden for Game 7 on Thursday.
snippet: With goals from Derek Stepan, Brad Richards and Chris Kreider, the Rangers’ victory means the testy first-round series will return to Madison Square Garden for Game 7 on Thursday.
